text: @ScramPratchett I mean, she didn't know that Cheshire cats always grinned; in fact, I didn't think it was winner of the Ankh-Morpork Mr.

passages.full_quote: "<used>I mean, she didn't</used> ever really eat anyone," said Nanny

She was better than them at witchcraft, that was true, but she couldn't knit a sock, <used>she didn't know</used> how to shoe a horse, and while she was pretty good at making cheese, she had to have three tries to bake a loaf that you could actually bite into with your teeth

passages.fragment: did n't know that Cheshire cats always grinned ; in fact , I did n't
passages.full_quote: I <used>didn't know that Cheshire cats always grinned; in fact, I didn't</used> know how she took it into her head to walk about the garden, for refreshment

passages.fragment: , I did n't think it was winner of the Ankh-Morpork Mr
passages.full_quote: "Well, <used>I didn't think it was winner of the Ankh-Morpork Mr</used>"
